paragraphs.text: And thank god UFM is not at Florida molding young men into serial killers anymore…. And Spurrier is a jerk for just quitting after 11 years and going to the NFL….and….Florida fans are a bunch of ungrateful cry baby pussies….this is UFM dream job! And you can’t handle it….enjoy the weather.
paragraphs.name: e5e0

paragraphs.text: Congrats, OSU beat a galactically overrated(as usual) Oklahoma that got blown out by Clemson in the playoff and Houston last month.

a083eda49cad.title: “I can’t even begin to describe how torqued this gets me” Well … you have a nice start.

paragraphs.text: “I can’t even begin to describe how torqued this gets me” Well … you have a nice start. Some perspective, though. This program is a huge success, but it is a success in a very commercial system. A system that as part of its business plan exploits kids for profit. I only hope that Urban takes as good care of his players as Woody did. All reports…

paragraphs.name: 330b

paragraphs.text: As a Florida Gators fan, I am quite familiar with Urban.

Yes, there is surely a lot of bitterness with how he handled his exit: short term resignation, followed by a terrible last season, while he pretty much checked out from the recruiting and the program as a whole.
